sysevent_script_action.name: SGCEnhance Run Full Import

sys_update_version.name: sysevent_script_action_f985fb8c47222110acb08f22736d435c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>x_156954_sgc_enhan.run_full_import</event_name><name>SGCEnhance Run Full Import</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[var dataSourceSysId = event.instance.toString();
//Get Data from source
var dataSource = new SGCEnhanceDataSource(dataSourceSysId);
var importSetSysId = dataSource.loadData();
//Run Preview
var importSet = new SGCEnhanceImportSet(importSetSysId);
importSet.runPreview();]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>erik.anderson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-27 12:37:31</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f985fb8c47222110acb08f22736d435c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SGCEnhance Run Full Import</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SGC Enhancement Suite" source="x_156954_sgc_enhan">8d8f28c647c16110acb08f22736d433f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SGC Enhancement Suite">8d8f28c647c16110acb08f22736d433f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_f985fb8c47222110acb08f22736d435c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>erik.anderson</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-27 12:37:31</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>
